description: Welcome to 1216 Johnson St! The largest townhome in this sought-after complex. Offering over 2,200 sqft across three levels, this 4-bedroom, 3-bath layout is designed for family living, with all bedrooms upstairs and a fully finished basement ideal for a rec room, gym, or office. The main floor features a spacious living and dining area, a bright kitchen with direct carport access, and private outdoor space. Major updates are complete with a new furnace (2024) and hot water tank (2023). Ready for renovations, this home gives buyers the opportunity to add their own style and create instant equity.
